recipes.title: Incomplete / Completed Clima-Tact
lines: The §lClima-Tact§r was first created by Usopp. It resembles a bo-staff that can be separated into three segments; §9Water§r, §6Fire§r and §bThunder§r.
In §9Water§r Mode you can freeze surrounding water block and nearby players (or mobs).
In §6Fire§r mode you can set players (or mobs) on fire.
Finally in §bThunder§r mode you can summon lightnings on other players (or mobs). Be aware that this mode will quickly wear out this item...
You can switch between modes by pressing <§aSHIFT§r> + <§aRight Click§r>
Note: Incomplete Clima-Tact cannot be used!
